title: Au large d'une vie (2015)
overview: Teva, a young Tahitian with a passion for film making, was compelled to leave his homeland to fulfill his ambitions. Having become a director, he returns to Tahiti and is once again confronted with the same painful choice that he had to make ten years before; should he stay or go? Did he make the right choice the last time?
storyline: Teva, a young Tahitian with a passion for filmmaking, was compelled to leave his homeland to fulfill his ambitions. Having become a director, he returns to Tahiti and is once again confronted with the same painful choice that he had to make ten years before; should he stay or go? Did he make the right choice the last time?
synopsis: Teva, a young Tahitian with a passion for filmmaking, was compelled to leave his homeland to fulfill his ambitions. Having become a director, he returns to Tahiti and is once again confronted with the same painful choice that he had to make ten years before; should he stay or go? Did he make the right choice the last time?Teva, un jeune tahitien passionné de cinéma, a dû quitter sa terre natale pour assouvir ses ambitions. Devenu réalisateur, de retour à Tahiti, il est à nouveau confronté au choix douloureux quil a du faire il y a dix ans : doit-il rester ou partir ? A-t-il autrefois fait le bon choix ?
